Name: C-Data Tec CPE-WiFi default password
Description: CPE-WiFi devices has a default password. Attackers can log in throung adminisp:adminisp,check the system status,and configurate the device.
Author: gonosecto@protonmail.com
Impact: Attackers can log in throung adminisp:adminisp,check the system status,and configurate the device.body
Recommendation: Modify the default password of the device
